kannada_original: ಈ ದಿನದ ರವಿಯುದಯ ನೋಡಿ ನಲಿ ಮನತುಂಬ;
english_transliteration: Ī dinada ravi-udaya nōḍi nali manatumba;
english_translation: See today's sunrise and rejoice wholeheartedly;
whether tomorrow's light will be in the eyes or not!
Consider each day's breath as the end of life!

kannada_original: ಇಡು ಹೆಜ್ಜೆ ನೀ ಹಗುರ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Iḍu hejje nī hagura – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Place your steps lightly – Muddu Rāma.
